node.title: .net developer
.net developer
node.text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #dotnet #aspnet #entityframework #remote

Full-stack Developer
Full-time, $60k-$80k annually, Remote

About us
* Our main product is practice management software system ‚ÄúStage 4 MD‚Äù. It is designed specifically for and used by plastic surgeons
* It is single-page multi-tenant application hosted in Azure cloud

Main technologies we use:
* ASP.Net MVC with DevExpress controls
* Entity Framework 6 with SQL Server Azure in Azure cloud
* DBUp is used for automatic database schema and data updates
* A part of the system system uses ASP.Net Web API for back-end with Vue.js front-end
* We boldly mix Vue.js with ASP.Net MVC by rendering MVC controls inside Vue.js components and visa versa
* Vue Router is used for single-page application navigation
* We recently moved code repository from Bitbucket to Github
* Tasks are still in Jira
* Teamcity builds generate binaries for development, and release branches. Binaries are deployed with one-click process
* We use Trunk Based Development for releases. Release deployment to production is done once every three weeks. QA deployment happens several times a week
* QA team runs automated browser tests as well as does some manual testing
* Every developer works with their local development environment
* Slack is used for communication

Your personal skills
* You have to be proficient with reading, writing and speaking English (expert level not required)
* From picking the next task to writing a specific line of code you are expected to be keeping in mind the customer‚Äôs needs and the value that your contribution creates for them
* You should be able to develop code that does its job, performs well, easy to read and maintain and doesn‚Äôt require additional explanations
* You need to self-manage next tasks from backlog, consistently report your progress and escalate roadblocks timely
* You are expected to be comfortable with asking questions, proposing better solutions and accepting suggestions from teammates, giving and taking feedback

Your technical skills
Things you‚Äôre expected to be well experienced with:
* C# and .Net Framework
* ASP.Net MVC and ASP.Net Web API
* JavaScript, HTML, CSS
* Entity Framework and SQL Server
* Git

Other things that are nice to know, but not required:
* ASP.Net Core
* Entity Framework Core
* DevExpress Controls
* Vue.js and Vuetify

Your compensation package
* You will operate as independent contractor (–ø—Ä–∏–º: –ò–ü –ø–æ –æ—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–º—É –¥–æ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä—É —Å –∞–º–µ—Ä–∏–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∫–æ–π –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–µ–π)
* You will receive $60k-$80k annually in bi-weekly payments (–¥–æ –Ω–∞–ª–æ–≥–æ–≤, –∏—Ö –≤—ã –ø–ª–∞—Ç–∏—Ç–µ —Å–∞–º–∏ –∫–∞–∫ –ò–ü)
* You will have unlimited time off in accordance with our time-off policy
* You can work from anywhere in the world, at hours of your convenience

Our recruitment process
* Skills test. Short online quiz to get a quick evaluation of your technical skills
* Interview. Brief conversation for you to tell about your interests, learn about our company and the product
* Test project. Review existing codebase, report fixes and improvements, and implement one or few of them
* Test week. Five days of paid work with us on our real project

Ready to start?
Take the test: https://apply.hire.toggl.com/966DPZE7RPE5Y9P8H27P?utm_source=dotnetrujobs

node.title: .net developer
node.text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞ #remote #fulltime

BokaMera is an online booking tool used by about 4000 companies. We are looking for a strong middle / senior .NET developer to work on our backend written in ServiceStack.

Salary: $2000 - $3000 gross.

Responsibilities:

- Write structured code and follow best practices
- Write unit tests and maintain existing ones (about 700 tests)
- Cooperate closely with frontend team
- Localize the project to distribute it between several countries and timezones
- Add support for Stripe payments
- Rewrite to .NET core

Technologies used:

- ServiceStack
- FluentValidator
- ORMLite
- MSSQL
- Swagger
- .NET 4.7.1

Send your CV to: kristian@bokamera.se

node.title: .net —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫
node.text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #—Å–ø–± #—É–¥–∞–ª—ë–Ω–Ω–æ #upper-intermediate
–∑\—Ä 3500-4000$
Responsibilities:
- Working within an Agile team to develop, test, and maintain SharePoint business applications built on Microsoft technologies.  
- Participating with the team in the collection and documentation of user's requirements, development of user stories, and estimates.  
- Design, develop, and unit test applications in accordance with established standards - Involved in High Level and Low Lever estimation process 
- Participating in reviews of other Agile team‚Äôs applications and code - Participating in application system and integration testing. 
- Package and support deployment of releases.  
- Adhering to high-quality development principles while delivering solutions on-time and on budget.  
- Providing third-level support to Business users. 
- Analyzing and resolving technical and application problems.  
- Preparing reports, manuals and other documentation  
- Work with Architect to develop best practices for solution development.
Minimum Requirements 
 - College or University degree in Computer Science or a related discipline  
- Motivated with a strong desire to learn  
- Clearly articulate ideas and thoughts verbally
Core Competency Requirements  
- Experience of Angular Framework, Typescript, SharePoint Framework, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, SharePoint Online out of the box components (Workflow, Web Parts, Lists, Libraries), relational database, Microsoft Azure, C#, .NET (OOPs Concepts)
Preferred Competency Requirements  
- 6 or more years of experience with Microsoft .NET development using C#  
- 6 or more years of experience with SQL Server database design and development. 
- 2 or more years of experience with Office 365. SPFX development 
- 6 or more years of experience with web development using HTML5, CSS and JavaScript, Angular Framework, Typescript 
- 3 or more years of experience with agile development methodologies  
- 6 or more years of experience with unit testing, system testing, integration testing.
–∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç @erzentd
